about_the_game:
We have a discord server! (Find it on the right section of this text)

Just for your information Tijmen is above the age of consent in New Zealand!!!

Doki Doki Tijmen Club is a romance visual novel in which you, the main character, whose goal is to win the heart of Tijmen. (the only other main character besides you) It's your first week in high school and need to get through various situations and choices in an attempt to be meaningful toward the mysterious and charming Tijmen.

  • CHOICES MATTER - Every time you make a choice, you're directly affecting the path your relationship with Tijmen is going to take. Be it being there for him through bad times, deep conversations, or even sharing personal experiences, each of your choices brings you closer or further from your ultimate goal: earning Tijmen's affection.

  • TRUE REALISM - Doki Doki Tijmen Club shows the true Tijmen in 2D using real-life photos. We captured the majority of the backgrounds used, including Tijmen himself.

  • COMPLEX STORY - The story is full of emotional depth, from sweet, heartfelt moments to moments of tension and uncertainty as you navigate the complexities of love and connection. As you progress, you will learn more about Tijmen's personality, hidden layer by layer, while managing unique dynamics and unpredictable situations.

With every decision mattering, Doki Doki Tijmen Club is an immersive experience where your actions shape the relationship you build up with Tijmen. Will you successfully win his heart, or will your attempts fall short? It all depends on the choices you make throughout this game for a truly personalized and engaging gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes: If seeing Tijmen hurt and dealt to others other than you is too much for you to handle. Be prepared for a WILD experience 🤠

detailed_description:

This is going to be an amazing game once it's done!

The game will have hours of content once released, Wishlist now!

name: Doki Doki Tijmen Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A once in a lifetime experience with Tijmen. Explore a world full for ripening with the one and only Tijmen. Tijmen is all that matters. Tijmen is love, Tijmen is life.
